definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.chinese: 在某些事上他行为不端。

sentences.english: They were scandalized by his improper behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 大家都对他的不端行为感到震惊。

sentences.english: Dan was fired because he misbehaved.
sentences.chinese: 阿丹因为行为不端被开除。

sentences.english: The teacher disciplined his student for bad behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 老师因学生行为不端而予以处罚。

sentences.english: And still, law enforcement seems inclined to let off banks for their misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 然而，法律似乎倾向于不计较银行的不端行为。

sentences.english: In contrast, in the West, misconduct of a scholar is a personal affair.
sentences.chinese: 相反，在西方，学者的不端行为属于个人事件。

sentences.english: His little brother has chummed up with some badly-behaved children.
sentences.chinese: 他的弟弟和一些行为不端的孩子混在一起。

sentences.english: They called for the establishment of independent expert committees to investigate claims of scientific misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求成立独立的专家委员会来调查学术不端行为。

sentences.english: He was suspended from school for bad conduct.
sentences.chinese: 他因品行不端而被停学。

sentences.english: I'll wring your neck if you don't behave!
sentences.chinese: 你要是行为不端，我就拧断你的脖子。

sentences.english: Smoking in pregnancy tied to bad behavior in kids .
sentences.chinese: 孕妇吸烟易造成儿童品行不端。

sentences.english: Misconduct had tainted the Olympic Games before, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，过去也发生过玷污奥运会的不端行为。

sentences.english: Paul appeared before the faculty to account for his various misdemeanours.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在全体教职员面前解释了他的种种不端行为。

sentences.english: He was very indignant with his wife over her improper conduct.
sentences.chinese: 他对他妻子的不端行为感到非常愤慨。

sentences.english: The officer was stripped of his rank for misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 那军官因行为不端被削去了军衔。

definition: to not conform to/to be unsuited to/to be out of keeping with/should not/ought out
lit. If the upper beam is not straight, the lower beam will be crooked (idiom); fig. subordinates imitate their superiors' vices
pinyin: shang4 liang2 bu4 zheng4 xia4 liang2 wai1

definition: words and actions/what one says and what one does
to insult/to direct bad language at sb/to slag off
